website_summaries.verdict: An affordable hardware wallet option that is easy to set up.
pros: Two hardware wallets for the price of one, featuring state of the art security
cons: Occasionally has issues working with Mac computers

customer_reviews.title: The future of bitcoin security
customer_reviews.text: Ledger wallets are absolutely the best thing you can do to secure your bitcoins. They also provide good tools for developing your own applications that utilize the nano. However, with the nano/hw1 you are limited to the functions within the firmware, meaning just basic bitcoin/eth wallet functions and a few others. The api is available on github if you look up btchip api specification. If you want real development freedom, I recommend getting the Nano S, as it has a fully functioning SDK to write any programs you want that utilize the secure element.
customer_reviews.author: Mike borghi

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best wallet to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. I own 2 nano duo sets as well as 2 Nano S Ledger wallets. This version is by far better and you get two so you can create a back up if you lose one. Take my word on this, the little digital readout on the Nano S looks neat but is not worth the extra money at all. This Nano works every time and is super user friendly. It is also much smaller than the Nano S which I like a lot. 5 stars all around on this yiu don't need anything else to protect coins.
customer_reviews.author: RDP

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recognize from Mac. Not sure what that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't recognize from Mac. Not sure what that is about. Going to try an updated version. Hoping not to need a Windows box to use the updated version.
customer_reviews.author: jtc-terminal

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to "cold store" your coins
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to "cold store" your coins. If you are looking for something that's secure, has regular updates for security/functionality and an alternative to a Treznor just get this.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to use. There is no more secure way to hold BTC than the Ledger Wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sealed. Instructions were easy to understand and do. Set up took almost no time at all. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Ledger Wallet Nano, Duo
customer_reviews.text: We'll all be using these someday, just a matter of time. Great Seller, Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Craig McClatchey

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: nice product, a little confusing at first but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hakes

customer_reviews.title: Trezor?! What's that?!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best. No screen, no need! Just does what it needs to do, your computer has a screen, why make twice the work?! Bank grade security at a price way lower than the other guy!
customer_reviews.author: Alan M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great for btc. Setup was a breeze and am enjoying my btc on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Passable"
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use, mediocre software and instructions. Launching the Ethereum app asks you to "launch the Ethereum app", and USB wallets never get recognized on my machine (a plain old normal Macbook Air). Wasted hours trying to get it to work. The only good instructions are in the review on Coindesk.
customer_reviews.author: JF Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Seller doesn't know their product, so don't ask.
customer_reviews.text: This functions much simpler than anticipated and it is a great wallet/vault if you have chosen to try and help Bitcoin grow.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Its not robust like a Yubikey
customer_reviews.text: The product feels flimsy. Its not robust like a Yubikey. I bought it as a budget option and perhaps their HW-1 would be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Why just one key card???
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a mistake to only include one security card. I dont get it...
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Decent cold storage for BITCOIN ONLY. Does not do any other cryptocurrencies.
customer_reviews.text: These serve their purpose, and having two is a good idea if you want to back it up for your kids sake. ONLY for BITCOIN, though..
customer_reviews.author: gmsky

customer_reviews.title: May wear out keep your back-up codes
customer_reviews.text: My Nano wallet broke and I was forced to used the backup codes. I had 700 on that little thing. I know to much but I moved it to Keepkey and im fine now but come on guys get it together.
customer_reviews.author: Mocheezmo

customer_reviews.title: I bought one of the Nano duo sets (2 usb ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of the Nano duo sets (2 usb sticks), directly from the ledger merchant website. It works so well, that i'm going to buy another set of them from Amazon as soon as I can. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Abdulkareem

customer_reviews.title: Deny of reality from ledger team
customer_reviews.text: A good, secure and cheap solution to store your bitcoin. Some flaws: - you rely on servers which are down sometimes - no way to control the fees you pay mean you pay for 1 BTC then confirm the transaction but you do not know the exact amount send : you now this AFTER the transaction was sent. so a malware can steal your fund - bugged sofware - software update is a real desaster, creating more bugs than fixing them. Next point, ledger employee treat your a terrific way when you report these problems on french forums : the answers state you are a unskilled unuseful liar.
customer_reviews.author: S. eric

product_meta.title: Ledger Wallet Nano Bitcoin Security Card, Duo Edition (Ledger Wallet Duo)
product_meta.description: Contains an extra ledger wallet paired to the same security card. Ideal to access your account from two different keys. Ledger wallet protects your keys with a secure micro-processor certified against all types of attacks (both physical and logical). This technology has been used in the banking industry for decades (think credit card chips). Our hardware wallet will do all the bitcoin cryptographic heavy lifting such as signing transactions inside its secure environment. You can therefore use your bitcoins with maximum trust, even on an insecure or compromised computer.
feature_bullets: Contains an extra ledger wallet paired to the same security card. Ideal to access your account from two different keys.

specifications.Operating System: Windows, Mac, Linux or Chrome OS.
